Layout/LineLength.description:
Description

Checks that line length does not exceed the configured limit.
Layout/LineLength.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

Max: 120 (type: int)
AllowHeredoc: True (type: bool)
AllowURI: True (type: bool)
AllowQualifiedName: True (type: bool)
URISchemes: ['http', 'https'] (type: list)
AllowRBSInlineAnnotation: False (type: bool)
AllowCopDirectives: True (type: bool)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
SplitStrings: False (type: bool)
